Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "EarthFest Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(March 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Sustainability Festival 1°16′46.124″N 103°52′16.26″E﻿ / ﻿1.27947889°N 103.8711833°E﻿ / 1.27947889; 103.8711833 **EarthFest Singapore** is a comprehensive festival celebrating [sustainability](/wiki/Sustainability) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) and first took place on 26 September 2015. The second festival occurred on 12 February 2017. The event is a collaboration between many different businesses and organisations in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) with the purpose of encouraging sustainability. The event has components of a [food festival](/wiki/Food_festival) - as an international food fair of foods with lower environmental footprints, a farmer's market and bazaar, and a [music festival](/wiki/Music_festival) which features live music from local talent, [edutainment](/wiki/Educational_entertainment) is covered with a carnival with environmentally themed educational games. EarthFest also screens documentaries and has talks about sustainability topics given by various experts in Singapore. It is a low-waste festival, incorporating elements of the circular and [sharing economies](/wiki/Sharing_economy). ## History Michael Broadhead is the volunteer director of the festival. The event is in collaboration with [Marina Barrage](/wiki/Marina_Barrage). ## Venue The festival at Marina Barrage is accessible via [Circle MRT line](/wiki/Circle_Line_(Singapore)) or [Downtown MRT line](/wiki/Downtown_Line) via [Bayfront MRT station](/wiki/Bayfront_MRT_station), by [walking](/wiki/Walking) and by [Bicycle](/wiki/Bicycle) (parking slots available). - [Vegfest](/wiki/Vegfest) - [Earth Hour](/wiki/Earth_Hour), [Earth Day](/wiki/Earth_Day) - [Shambala Festival](/wiki/Shambala_Festival) - [The Transition Decade](/wiki/The_Transition_Decade) - [Sustainability](/wiki/Sustainability) - [Sustainable living](/wiki/Sustainable_living) - [Plant-based diet](/wiki/Plant-based_diet) - Official website
